title: Febuary Abusers are looking for a D4+ Jungler (APPLY HERE!)
body:
The main goal/reasons of Febuary Abusers is for players who are passionate about wanting to play competitively in amateur scene as well as work towards playing in the OCS as the end game goal/dream

To achieve this goal as a team and for its players, players apart of the team are expected to participate in activities such as

- Amaetur Scene Tournaments (Sum Soc, Total Mayhem Gaming, Oceanic Gaming OOL and potential cash prizing tournaments when they 
pop up)

- Scrims ( Trying to find mid diamond/ high diamond teams willing to scrim . hopefully making a name for our team so ocs teams e.g. UTS etc are willing to scrim)

- Vod Reviews 

- Duo Q

- Vods/K Vods in spare time/self time.

If you aren't a jungler still feel free to apply, We are also looking for subs!
If you have any regards about the application please contact me on Discord or league




ign: Maii Man
Discord: MaiI#0873
